dialog.text: Finally! Its the end of the week.  What are you up to?
I'm delivering parcels all weekend. Jeff's lucky, he doesn't have to work - why don't you see if he wants to game?  Have you looked through the learning outcomes yet?

joins.text: Maybe you can help me then.

dialog.text: No idea what is going on with them, I mean, how are we supposed to know what work goes with what outcome.  I've asked Jordan in Year 2 to see if he can help me later today.  Have a great weekend  :partying_face:
